title: Disable certain characters in URF
body: I know people don't care about "Urf Balance", but my god some characters are just not cool. The first urf iterations had people permanently turned off so you couldn't even use/get them. I don't see that why that doesn't still happen. If the enemy team has a {{champion:54}} you are pretty much just waiting until you can FF. If we aren't getting bans, can you at least turn off some of the instagib champs that you can do nothing about lmao.

replies.body:
I'm confused. Kassadin was deemed so toxic he was disabled in previous URF iterations, yet he has +10% damage. Zilean has free GAs on a near zero cooldown yet he has +20% damage.

I now remember why I hate this game mode.

I had game where I was playing Yummi and had Panth as teammate. 
We were running with 750 ms and with 500 heal every 1 sec plus point and click stun. 
Panth had like 40 kills in 20 mins. 
For us it was super fun, but I am not sure about enemy

You know what's worse? when he has a few cloud drakes lowering his ult cd on URF. I don't understand why people ignore drakes, especially cloud ones giving people ults under 10 seconds of cooldown.
A lot of stuff is way worse than malphite, especially when hourglass exists.

Also god forbid if ur an AD champ. You just lose. :)
